casebody.data:
MEDICAL ALTERNATIVES, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
AUTO-OWNERS INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158798
COA: 340561 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motions of defendant-appellee for immediate consideration and to extend the time for filing its answer are GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before January 25, 2019.
